mapper.select: select e.EMP_CODE ,e.EMP_NAME , e.DEP_CODE AS "EMP_DEP_CODE",c.DEP_CODE ,c.UPDEP_CODE from employee e, code c where SUBSTRING_INDEX(e.EMP_CODE,'-',1) like #{code} and SUBSTRING_INDEX(e.EMP_CODE,'-',1) = c.COM_CODE
mapper.insert: insert into notice (EMP_CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, TARGET, END_DATE) values (#{empCode}, #{title}, #{content}, #{targets}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET TARGET = CONCAT( SUBSTRING(TARGET, 1, LOCATE(CONCAT(#{empCode}, ':'), TARGET) + LENGTH(CONCAT(#{empCode}, ':')) - 1), #{state}, SUBSTRING(TARGET, LOCATE(CONCAT(#{empCode}, ':'), TARGET) + LENGTH(CONCAT(#{empCode}, ':')) + 1) ) WHERE TARGET LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empCode}, ':%') and NOTICE_NUM like #{noticeNum}
